body:
The following packages should be assigned to cray personnel (@lukebroskop ?) 

- https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cray-mpich/package.py
- https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cray-libsci/package.py
- https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cray-fftw/package.py

It's quite amusing that cray packages have a homepage set to NERSC documentation, we are not the providers for cray packages. These URLs should be removed with something else or just home page to HPE/Cray website.

https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/d4ca803fc58e127469fd0e0773b89fdc2087fac0/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cray-fftw/package.py#L21

https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/d4ca803fc58e127469fd0e0773b89fdc2087fac0/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cray-mpich/package.py#L16

https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/d4ca803fc58e127469fd0e0773b89fdc2087fac0/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cray-libsci/package.py#L12

I see @haampie is assigned the maintainer for these packages but he doesn't work at Cray. I don't mind having multiple maintainers but our first POC should be Cray staff.
title: Update Package Maintainers for Cray Package
